body_content.explanation: the quality of being misty (= with small drops of water in the air which make it difficult to see into the distance):
examples: She could hardly see where sea and sky met far away in the soft grey mistiness.
the greyish-creamy mistiness of a cold, hazy morning

body_content.explanation: the quality of being uncertain or difficult to see or understand:
examples: He let himself slip away into the mistiness of sleep.
The sun was beating down and there was a sort of mistiness in my head.
